extendedInfo.detail: 0 g trans fat. Per 1/8 Shell Serving: 140 calories; 1 g sat fat (5% DV); 290 mg sodium (13% DV); less than 1 g total sugars.  Delicious any way you imagine it. No high fructose corn syrup. What will you create? Boboli color palette. Create boldly. To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong. Joseph Chilton Pearce. You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have. Maya Angelou. Creativity is intelligence having fun. Einstein. The world always seems brighter when you've just made something that wasn't there before. Neil Gaiman. Let's think outside the pizza box. Let's enjoy making something delicious together. Let's break the rules and dream big. Let's play with our food and have a little fun. It's time to make something delightful that we'll all remember and enjoy. Time for new combinations and amazing tastes. Time to let our imaginations run loose and see where it leads. It's all good, and always tastes even better when we all do it together. Enjoy! Facebook. Looking for more inspirations? Visit. BoboliPizza on facebook or boboli.com. SmartLabel: Scan for more food information or call 1-800-432-8266.  Terracycle: Join our recycling program. www.terracycle.com/bimbobakeries.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Wheat Flour, Water, Vegetable Oil (Palm), Salt, Yeast, Milk Casein, Sugar, Mozzarella Cheese (Milk, Cheese Cultures, Salt And Enzymes), Preservatives (Calcium Propionate, Sorbic Acid), Fumaric Acid, Food Starch-Modified (Potato), Whey, Leavening (Sodium Aluminum Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate), Mono- And Diglycerides, Lactic Acid, Natural Flavor, Artificial Color, Enrichment (Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamin Mononitrate (Vitamin B1), Riboflavin (Vitamin B2), Folic Acid], Wheat Starch, Garlic.
extendedInfo.directions: How to create a new favorite every night: 1. Ignite your imagination. 2. Gather your favorite toppings - and some new ones. 3. Get creative as you top your pizza. 4. Bake for 10-15 minutes at 450 degrees F. 5. Enjoy your masterpiece! Cooking Instructions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. Remove Boboli Pizza Crust from wrapper. Spread some tasty sauce or Evoo on the crust. Decorate with toppings. Place directly on the oven rack or on baking sheet. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until desired crispness. Yum!  Tear here to open.
